item.description:
Please join me for this unique beer tasting and oyster paring at Bottles Fine Wine! Meet Garrett Oliver, world-renowned brewmaster from Brooklyn Brewery, at Bottles! On Friday, October 19th from 3:30 - 6:00pm at our Providence, RI store, Garrett will be stopping by for a book signing of The Brewmaster's Table and the recently published Oxford Companion to Beer.

Bottles will also be offering free tastings of several Brooklyn Brewery beers, including Sorachi Ace and Local 2. You can also treat yourself to fresh Rhode Island oysters provided by Walrus and Carpenter Oysters. Maybe he'll even sign a bottle or two for you. Excited yet? We are!

Oysters are $1 each and the tastings are free!

FEATURED BEERS
Local One Behind the full golden color you'll find an alluring aroma, a dynamic complex of flavors, Belgian flair, Brooklyn fortitude and a dusting of our special yeast.
Local Two Our special Belgian yeast adds hints of spice to the dark fruit, caramel, and chocolate flavors
Sorachi Ace A crackingly dry, hoppy unfiltered golden farmhouse ale
Black Chocolate Stout Three mashes are used to brew each batch of this beer, achieving a luscious deep dark chocolate flavor through a blend of specially roasted malts

Â
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the brown and pink scarf in my picture and will be there around 4pm
item.name: Garrett Oliver visits Bottles! Brooklyn Beer Tasting and Oyster Shucking
